title: Open Source Developer Patronage - Support and Sustain Open-Source
description: Explore why Open Source Developer Patronage is important, how it supports sustainability, innovation, and quality, and discover ways to contribute through donations, sponsorships, and platforms like GitHub Sponsors or Open Collective.
keywords: Open Source, Developer Patronage, Support Developers, Open Source Sustainability, GitHub Sponsors, Crowdfunding for Developers, Corporate Sponsorship, Open Source Funding
